summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PowerCleanService website. Backend APIs working correctly, frontend mostly functional with one critical admin login issue.

ui_bugs.issue: Admin login API succeeds but token not stored in localStorage, shows 'Sitzung abgelaufen' error

integration_issues.issue: Token storage and state management not working properly after successful login

passed_tests: Homepage loads with hero section, services overview, client logos
Services page with filtering and search functionality
Service detail pages load with all content
Contact, Impressum, Datenschutz, AGB pages load correctly
Backend API endpoints all working (11/11 tests passed)
Admin API authentication and CRUD operations work
Service preselection in inquiry form works
Form validation and success states work
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix admin login token storage issue in AdminPage.jsx - API returns token successfully but localStorage.setItem() not working, causing 'Sitzung abgelaufen' error and preventing dashboard access
